offers.name: 1.Exclusive luncheon cocktail with Corsair
offers.description: Corsair exclusively invites you to join a lunchtime cocktail. Only for those who redeem this offer.
offers.redemption:
How To Redeem Your Offer:
Corsair invites its TO and Groupists customers to a lunch cocktail on our stand G093 - by invitation only. Show this redeemed offer to access
